product_name: The North Face RDT Shirt - Women's
long_description: The North Face RDT shirt is an ideal layer to have next to your skin while hiking. This lightweight stretch knit has FlashDry(TM) fibers to help keep you dry when you start to work up a sweat. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, FlashDry fibers dramatically improve the fabric's dry time and breathability, help control odors and won't wash out. Recycled polyester wicks away sweat and stretches with you. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Flatlock seams on The North Face RDT shirt reduce chafing and increase durability.
short_description: The North Face RDT shirt is an ideal layer to have next to your skin while hiking. This lightweight stretch knit has FlashDry(TM) fibers to help keep you dry when you start to work up a sweat.
